Label.text: Planned Start Date can not be greater than Planned End Date
Select an active user of the start warehouse as the co-driver.
Select a truck that’s an active vehicle for Start Warehouse.
Select a trailer that’s an active vehicle for Start Warehouse.
You can’t select the same vehicle for Trailer 1 and Trailer2.
Finish all End Tour activities before completing the tour
Enter a final odometer reading that’s greater than or equal to the initial odometer reading.
Select the End Tour Condition Reason as the vehicle isn’t in good condition upon finishing the tour.
